course_title: Pediatric Primary Care NP Practicum II
course_description: This course focuses on primary care of children that are well and acutely ill. Emphasis is on delivery of evidenced-based care in a pediatric primary care setting.
sections: Class Nbr: 5308, Section #: 1, Type: CLN, Campus: ATL, Meets: Meets Online, Instructor: L. Modly, Status: Open
